title: Just a fox
body:
{{champion:238}} + Edge of night = {{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}  

No but seriously. I am so ready for these Zed's to gain a 10 second spellshield, ult me, soak up my charm, proc that true damage duskblade and sit back with some popcorn and watch me pop (and get like 7+ ad lol).

replies.body: Don't forget the part where he spams laugh.

You mean because zed does not already counter ahri enough already?

That said, many awful bronze zeds have been baited under turrets in amusing ways. also yasuos. Remember, kids: never counterpick with champs you are complete shit at playing!
